page.description: Remove an argument from the collection.
page.prototype: Result_Flag as L = Remove(Name as C)

argument.name: Name
argument.description: The unique name property of an argument. See the [SQL::Argument class].

page.discussion: The Remove() method removes an argument from a SQL::Arguments object. Returns true (.t.) if the operation is successful and returns false (.f.) if it fails.
page.example:
dim args as SQL::Arguments args.add("city", "Boston") args.add("state", "MA")
? args.ArgumentNumber("state") = 2
? args.remove("city") = .T.
? args.ArgumentNumber("state") = 1
